transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? 
Executive: Aur sir, IndiaMART automation se baat kar rahe hain sir, Sanket ji?
Customer: Ji, ji baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Aur sir, ji sir very good evening sir, Sumit baat kar raha hu sir main IndiaMART se, kaise ho aap?
Customer: IndiaMART se Sumit ji, haan badhiya, badhiya.
Executive: Ji ji, actually sir maine call isliye kiya tha aapka yaha pe conversation chal raha tha apna aapki account manager hai Yashoda ji ke saath. 
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Toh film mein hai na jo aapki yaha pe mam dekhti hain aaj unke saath bhi properly dobara se bhi conversation hua hai is cheezo ko leke. 
Customer: Haan haan. 
Executive: Hai na toh sara unko pura ek baar dobara se fir se guide kiya hai related to the queries, calls, leads vagaira ka leke. 
Customer: Sir ek minute hold kare, ek minute hold kare.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Ek call pe tha main aadhe ghante mein call karu aapko?
Executive: Chaliye koi problem nahi hai sir ek baar free ho jaiyega koi dikkat nahi hai sir baat kar lenge.
Customer: Nahi nahi aapko nahi keh raha main dusre phone pe chal raha tha, ye bataye. Aapke liye toh.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to call back in half an hour.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call back later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, calls, account manager, queries
